name: To Die For Garlic Feta Pate
author: DARLENE HINTON
summary: Friends beg me to make this when they come over. Cream cheese, garlic, anchovies, feta cheese and fresh chives are quickly blended and ready to serve in this easy gourmet snack. Even serious dieters can't resist this heavenly spread! Serve with crackers, toasted pita wedges, or sliced baguette.
ingredients: 1 dash hot pepper sauce (e.g. Tabasco™), or to taste
freshly ground black pepper to taste
directions: Combine the garlic, anchovies, butter, cream cheese, feta cheese, sour cream, chives, hot pepper sauce and pepper in the container of a food processor
Transfer to a serving bowl, and serve with crackers, bread slices, or pita chips
